content.raw:
It seems that this patch fixes the case where we thought that the point was within the bounding box but in reality it was not. 

Should we also fix the opposite case? The bounding box reports that the point is not contained in it, but in reality it is...

Not sure how to do it without casting a ray all the time.
content.html:
It seems that this patch fixes the case where we thought that the point was within the bounding box but in reality it was not.

Should we also fix the opposite case? The bounding box reports that the point is not contained in it, but in reality it is...

Not sure how to do it without casting a ray all the time.
